# Create test cases for Feature-Increment

Execute the **test** workflow as a **QA Engineer**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_QA.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_QA.md)

## Workflow

Create Test Cases for Feature-Increment:
1. Read Feature-Increment and linked stories
2. Identify test scenarios
3. Write test cases with steps and expected results
4. Create tc-fi-PRX-NNN-description.md using template

## Template

Use template: `/.teamspec/templates/tc-template.md`

## Output

projects/{id}/qa/test-cases/tc-fi-PRX-*.md
